attributes.action: stop nurses wearing their uniforms out side hospitals
attributes.additional_details:
stop nurse wearing their uniforms as everyday wear outside hospitals ,their uniforms should be sterile as to stop the spread of germs.
this lack of hygiene is probably the biggest mistake since the removal of matrons who would have overseen this disregard for hospital hygiene and makes a mockery of sterilizing your hand when entering hospitals to combat the spread of germs too frequently present in hospitals today
